displayName: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
rationale: Enforcing this control reduces the threat of an entity leveraging these facilities for malicious purposes.
error_message: Server has 'Scan For Startup Procs' set to '1'
ruleNames: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
